name: Sibers
tagline: Taking the Risk Out of IT Innovation
description:
Sibers — your one-stop provider of premium software development services.
Developing custom software solutions since 1998 and employing 150+ experienced in-house developers, Sibers provides safe outsourcing services and high quality results for your business.
We work with startups, intermediaries and established businesses, develop web, desktop and mobile solutions, using .NET, PHP, JS, Objective-C, Swift, Java and Kotlin — to name just the main technologies.
 
We love coding and know how to do it right. Among others 1700+ top-notch IT outsourcing solutions, Sibers team has developed a video editor ranked #1 among apps for working with video on the App Store, a good many of successful e-commerce, healthcare and web-to-print solutions.
One of the desktop apps we’ve developed, analyzes sportsmen techniques and compares their movements to the “ideal effort”, taking in consideration the sportsman’s body parameters. The athlete, who used the app while training, has won the Olympic gold, and the app was reviewed in The Washington Post.
To learn more about Sibers’ experience, please, visit our website www.sibers.com.
For free consultation and quote please contact us at sales@sibers.com or call:
US:  +1 (800) 521-4091
AU: +61 (040) 045-3502
UK: +44 20 7097 8898
RU: +7 (383) 330-6626
